00029 {
00030   protected:
00031     int seqNum;
00032 
00033     // statistics
00034     long totalFromHigherLayer;  // total number of packets received from higher layer
00035     long totalFromMAC;          // total number of frames received from MAC
00036     long totalPauseSent;        // total number of PAUSE frames sent
00037
